name: IRS metrics
description: Reports utilising the data collected by IRS on DPS to provide insights for various metrics.

dataset.name: DW actions / day
dataset.query:
select Cast(Date_trunc('day', correction_requested_at) AS DATE)         as day,
       to_char(min(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY')              as min_date,
       to_char(max(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY')              as max_date,
       coalesce(correction_requested_by, 'All data wardens')            as dw_username,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' THEN id END)  as sent_back,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'HOLD' THEN id END)                as held,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'RECALL' THEN id END)              as recalled,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'CLOSE' THEN id END)               as closed,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'MARK_DUPLICATE' THEN id END)      as marked_as_duplicate,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'MARK_NOT_REPORTABLE' THEN id END) as marked_as_np,
       count(id)                                                        as total_actions
from correction_request cr
where user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN'
group by day, ROLLUP(correction_requested_by)

dataset.name: DW actions / month
dataset.query:
select Cast(Date_trunc('month', correction_requested_at) AS DATE)       as month,
       to_char(min(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY')              as min_date,
       to_char(max(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY')              as max_date,
       coalesce(correction_requested_by, 'All data wardens') as dw_username,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' THEN id END)  as sent_back,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'HOLD' THEN id END)                as held,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'RECALL' THEN id END)              as recalled,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'CLOSE' THEN id END)               as closed,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'MARK_DUPLICATE' THEN id END)      as marked_as_duplicate,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'MARK_NOT_REPORTABLE' THEN id END) as marked_as_np,
       count(id)                                                        as total_actions
from correction_request
where user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN'
group by month, ROLLUP(correction_requested_by)

dataset.name: % of reports returned / month
dataset.query:
select month, min_date, max_date, location, incident_type, all_reports, returned, dw_not_seen, closed,
       CASE WHEN (all_reports-dw_not_seen) = 0 THEN 0.0
            ELSE ROUND((CAST(returned as numeric)/(all_reports-dw_not_seen))*100, 1)
           END as dw_seen_percentage_returned
from (
         select Cast(Date_trunc('month', created_at) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(created_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(created_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date,
                COALESCE(r.location, 'All locations') as location,
                COALESCE(ct.description, 'All incident types') as incident_type,
                count(r.id) as all_reports,
                count(CASE WHEN cr.requested_corection = '1' THEN r.id END) as returned,
                count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('DRAFT', 'AWAITING_REVIEW') THEN r.id END) as dw_not_seen,
                count(CASE WHEN r.status in ('CLOSED', 'DUPLICATE', 'NOT_REPORTABLE') THEN r.id END) as closed
         from report as r
                  left join (
             select DISTINCT report_id, '1' as requested_corection
             from correction_request
             where user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION') as cr
                            on r.id = cr.report_id
                  left join (
             select code, description
             from constant_type
         ) as ct
                            on r.type = ct.code
         where r.source = 'DPS' and r.location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
         group by Date_trunc('month', r.created_at), ROLLUP(r.location), ROLLUP(ct.description))

dataset.name: % of reviews returned / month
dataset.query:
select *, ROUND((CAST(sent_back as numeric)/reports_reviewed)*100, 1) as per_returned
from (
         select Cast(Date_trunc('month', correction_requested_at) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date,
                COALESCE(location, 'All locations') as location,
                COALESCE(incident_type, 'All incident types') as incident_type,
                COUNT(report_id) as reports_reviewed,
                COUNT(CASE when user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' then report_id END) as sent_back,
                COUNT(CASE when user_action <> 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' then report_id END) as completed
         from (
                  select report_id, correction_requested_at, location, description as incident_type, sequence, user_action, prev_dw_action, following_dw_action
                  from (
                           select report_id, sequence, user_action, correction_requested_at, ct.description, r.location,
                                  first_value(sequence) over (partition by report_id order by sequence) as first_dw_sequence,
                                  lag(user_action) OVER (partition by report_id order by sequence) as prev_dw_action,
                                  lag(user_action) OVER (partition by report_id order by sequence desc) as following_dw_action
                           from correction_request as cr
                                    left join (
                               select id, source, type, location from report
                           ) as r
                                              on cr.report_id = r.id
                                    left join (
                               select code, description from constant_type
                           ) as ct
                                              on r.type = ct.code
                           where r.source = 'DPS' and user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN' and r.location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
                           order by report_id desc, sequence asc)
                  where (sequence = first_dw_sequence and user_action <> 'HOLD') or (sequence = first_dw_sequence + 1 and prev_dw_action = 'HOLD'))
         group by Cast(Date_trunc('month', correction_requested_at) AS DATE), ROLLUP(location), ROLLUP(incident_type))

dataset.name: Report actions / week
dataset.query:
select Cast(Date_trunc('week', cr.correction_requested_at) AS DATE) as week, to_char(min(cr.correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(cr.correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date,
       COALESCE(r.location, 'All locations') as location,
       COALESCE(ct.description, 'All incident types') as incident_type,
       count(DISTINCT(cr.report_id)) as num_reports,
       count(cr.id) as total_actions,
       ROUND(CAST(count(cr.id) as numeric)/CAST(count(DISTINCT(cr.report_id)) as numeric),1) as avg_actions_per_report,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'REQUEST_REVIEW' THEN cr.id END) as num_req_review,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'REQUEST_DUPLICATE' THEN cr.id END) as num_req_dup,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'REQUEST_NOT_REPORTABLE' THEN cr.id END) as num_req_nr,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' THEN cr.id END) as num_sent_back,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'HOLD' THEN cr.id END) as num_held,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'RECALL' AND user_type = 'REPORTING_OFFICER' THEN cr.id END) as num_recalled_ro,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'RECALL' AND user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN' THEN cr.id END) as num_recalled_dw,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'CLOSE' THEN cr.id END) as num_closed,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'MARK_DUPLICATE' THEN cr.id END) as num_mark_dup,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'MARK_NOT_REPORTABLE' THEN cr.id END) as num_mark_nr
from correction_request as cr
left join (
    select location, id, type, source from report
) as r
on cr.report_id = r.id
left join (
    select code, description
    from constant_type
) as ct
on r.type = ct.code
where r.source = 'DPS'
group by week, ROLLUP(r.location), ROLLUP(ct.description)

dataset.name: Report actions / month
dataset.query:
select Cast(Date_trunc('month', cr.correction_requested_at) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(cr.correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(cr.correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date,
       COALESCE(r.location, 'All locations') as location,
       COALESCE(ct.description, 'All incident types') as incident_type,
       count(DISTINCT(cr.report_id)) as num_reports,
       count(cr.id) as total_actions,
       ROUND(CAST(count(cr.id) as numeric)/CAST(count(DISTINCT(cr.report_id)) as numeric),1) as avg_actions_per_report,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'REQUEST_REVIEW' THEN cr.id END) as num_req_review,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'REQUEST_DUPLICATE' THEN cr.id END) as num_req_dup,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'REQUEST_NOT_REPORTABLE' THEN cr.id END) as num_req_nr,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' THEN cr.id END) as num_sent_back,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'HOLD' THEN cr.id END) as num_held,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'RECALL' AND user_type = 'REPORTING_OFFICER' THEN cr.id END) as num_recalled_ro,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'RECALL' AND user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN' THEN cr.id END) as num_recalled_dw,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'CLOSE' THEN cr.id END) as num_closed,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'MARK_DUPLICATE' THEN cr.id END) as num_mark_dup,
       count(CASE WHEN user_action = 'MARK_NOT_REPORTABLE' THEN cr.id END) as num_mark_nr
from correction_request as cr
left join (
    select location, id, type, source from report
) as r
on cr.report_id = r.id
left join (
    select code, description
    from constant_type
) as ct
on r.type = ct.code
where r.source = 'DPS'
group by month, ROLLUP(r.location), ROLLUP(ct.description)

dataset.name: Submission statistics per month
dataset.query:
select Cast(Date_trunc('month', reported_at) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(reported_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(reported_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date, 
	COALESCE(location, 'All locations') as location, count(id) as total_reports, 
	ROUND(AVG(time_diff_mins),1) as avg_mins, 
	ROUND(CAST(PERCENTILE_CONT(0.5) WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY time_diff_mins) as numeric),1) as median_mins, 
	ROUND(MAX(time_diff_hrs),1) as longest_submitted_hrs, 
	count(CASE WHEN (time_diff_hrs > 72) THEN id END) as number_took_too_long,
	ROUND((CAST(count(CASE WHEN (time_diff_hrs > 72) THEN id END) as numeric)/CAST(count(id) as numeric))*100, 1) as perc_too_long,
	ROUND(AVG(CASE WHEN time_diff_mins < 4320 THEN time_diff_mins END),1) as avg_mins_wo_too_long, 
	count(CASE WHEN correction_requested_at is null THEN id END) as not_yet_actioned,
	count(CASE WHEN status = 'DRAFT' THEN id END) as currently_in_draft,
	count(CASE WHEN status = 'DRAFT' and ROUND(EXTRACT(epoch from (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - reported_at))/3600, 1) > 72 THEN id END) as number_overdue
from (
	select *, time_diff_mins/60 as time_diff_hrs
	from (
		select r.id, r.location, r.type, r.status, r.reported_at, cr.correction_requested_at, cr.user_action, 
			CASE when (correction_requested_at is not null) then ROUND(EXTRACT(epoch from (cr.correction_requested_at - r.reported_at))/60, 1)
			else null end as time_diff_mins
		from report as r
		left join (
			select report_id, correction_requested_at, user_action 
			from correction_request
			where sequence = 0 and user_action in ('REQUEST_REVIEW', 'REQUEST_NOT_REPORTABLE', 'REQUEST_DUPLICATE') and user_type = 'REPORTING_OFFICER'
			) as cr
			on r.id = cr.report_id
		where location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH') and source = 'DPS'
	)
)
group by Date_trunc('month', reported_at), ROLLUP(location)

dataset.name: Response statistics per month
dataset.query:
select dwlp.month, dw.min_date, dw.max_date, dwlp.location, dw.dw_resp_time_days, ro.ro_resp_time_days, dwlp.feedback_loop_days
from (
	select Cast(Date_trunc('month', r.created_at) AS DATE) as month,
	COALESCE(r.location, 'All locations') as location, ROUND(AVG(stats.time_since_last)/24, 1) as feedback_loop_days
	from report as r
	left join (
		select cr.report_id, diff.time_since_last
		from correction_request as cr
			left join (	
		select report_id, sequence, time_since_last from (
		select *, sequence - lag(sequence) OVER (PARTITION by report_id order by sequence) as seq_diff, 
			ROUND(EXTRACT(epoch from (correction_requested_at - lag(correction_requested_at) OVER (PARTITION by report_id order by sequence) ))/3600, 1) as time_since_last
			from (
		select cr.report_id, sequence, correction_requested_at
		from correction_request as cr
		left join (
			select report_id, CASE WHEN count(id) > 1 THEN 1 ElSE null END as marker
			from correction_request
			where user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN'
			group by report_id) as mk
		on cr.report_id = mk.report_id
		where mk.marker is not null and user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN'
		order by report_id, sequence
			)
		)
		where seq_diff > 1
			) as diff
		on cr.report_id = diff.report_id and cr.sequence = diff.sequence
		where diff.time_since_last is not null) as stats
	on r.id = stats.report_id
	where r.source = 'DPS' and r.location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
	group by Date_trunc('month', r.created_at), ROLLUP(r.location)) as dwlp
join (	
	select Cast(Date_trunc('month', r.created_at) AS DATE) as month, COALESCE(r.location, 'all active locations') as location, ROUND(AVG(stats.time_since_last)/24, 1) as ro_resp_time_days
	from report as r
	left join (
		select report_id, time_since_last
		from (
			select *,
				ROUND(EXTRACT(epoch from (correction_requested_at - lag(correction_requested_at) OVER (PARTITION by report_id order by sequence) ))/3600, 1) as time_since_last,
				lag(user_type) OVER (PARTITION by report_id order by sequence) as last_user_type
			from correction_request 
			order by report_id desc, sequence
		)
		where user_type <> last_user_type and user_type = 'REPORTING_OFFICER') as stats
	on r.id = stats.report_id
	where r.source = 'DPS' and r.location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
	group by Date_trunc('month', r.created_at), ROLLUP(r.location)
	) as ro
	on dwlp.month = ro.month and dwlp.location = ro.location
join (
	select Cast(Date_trunc('month', r.created_at) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(r.created_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(r.created_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date,
	COALESCE(r.location, 'all active locations') as location, ROUND(AVG(stats.time_since_last)/24, 1) as dw_resp_time_days
	from report as r
	left join (
		select report_id, time_since_last
		from (
			select *,
				ROUND(EXTRACT(epoch from (correction_requested_at - lag(correction_requested_at) OVER (PARTITION by report_id order by sequence) ))/3600, 1) as time_since_last,
				lag(user_type) OVER (PARTITION by report_id order by sequence) as last_user_type
			from correction_request 
			order by report_id desc, sequence
		)
		where user_type <> last_user_type and user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN') as stats
	on r.id = stats.report_id
	where r.source = 'DPS' and r.location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
	group by Date_trunc('month', r.created_at), ROLLUP(r.location) ) as dw
on dwlp.month = dw.month and dwlp.location = dw.location

dataset.name: Incidents reopened / week
dataset.query:
select Cast(Date_trunc('week', sh.changed_at) AS DATE) as week, to_char(min(sh.changed_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(sh.changed_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date,
       COALESCE(r.location, 'All locations') as location,
       COALESCE(ct.description, 'All incident types') as incident_type,
       count(sh.report_id) as reopened_count
from status_history as sh
left join (
    select location, type, id from report
) as r
on sh.report_id = r.id
left join (
    select code, description
    from constant_type
) as ct
on r.type = ct.code
where status = 'REOPENED'
group by week, ROLLUP(r.location), ROLLUP(ct.description)

dataset.name: Incidents reopened / month
dataset.query:
select Cast(Date_trunc('month', sh.changed_at) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(sh.changed_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(sh.changed_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date,
       COALESCE(r.location, 'All locations') as location,
       COALESCE(ct.description, 'All incident types') as incident_type,
       count(sh.report_id) as reopened_count
from status_history as sh
left join (
    select location, type, id from report
) as r
on sh.report_id = r.id
left join (
    select code, description
    from constant_type
) as ct
on r.type = ct.code
where status = 'REOPENED'
group by month, ROLLUP(r.location), ROLLUP(ct.description)

dataset.name: Locations
dataset.query:
select DISTINCT(location) as location
from report
where source = 'DPS' and location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
UNION ALL
select 'All locations' as location

dataset.name: Incident Types
dataset.query:
SELECT DISTINCT(description) FROM constant_type_family
UNION ALL
select 'All incident types' as description

dataset.name: Data wardens
dataset.query:
select DISTINCT(correction_requested_by) as dw_username
from correction_request
where user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN'
UNION ALL
select 'All data wardens' as dw_username

report.name: DW actions / day
report.description: Counts of incident report actions conducted by data wardens per day.

report.name: DW actions / month
report.description: Counts of incident report actions conducted by data wardens per month.

report.name: % of reports returned / month
report.description: % of incident reports returned to reporting officers by data wardens categorised by when the report was created.

seen by a DW

report.description: Counts of all user actions on reports per week.
